events.message: John Doe submitted his application for the Software Engineer position with a detailed resume highlighting his experience in backend development.
The application has been categorized under Engineering, focusing on software development roles due to keywords like 'backend' and 'engineer' in the resume.
Recruiter Sarah Lee was assigned to manage John Doe's application to coordinate next steps and communications regarding the software engineering position.
Sarah conducted an initial screening call to assess John's technical skills and cultural fit for the developer role, receiving positive responses about his experience.
John responded enthusiastically to the initial screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed with the next technical interview stage.
A technical interview was scheduled for John with the senior software engineer team to evaluate his coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
